title: How to use Windows 10 without giving up your privacy
text:
How to use Windows 10 without giving up your privacy 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Privacy advocates aren't thrilled at some of the data that's shared by default in Windows 10. Luckily, there are several steps users can tak...
